data.name: MapleStory (Original Game Soundtrack) : Heroes of Maple
data.detailed_description:
Heroes of Maple was a huge blockbuster adventure, allowing players to experience the story through the eyes of each of the six heroes—Mercedes, Aran, Phantom, Luminous, Evan, and Shade. The multi-Act story saw the heroes combine forces to save the World Tree from destruction by the Black Mage’s commander, Damien. Standout tracks include "The Tragic Fate of Damien" whose distinctive grandeur and rich rhythm section perfectly complements the tense battle that unfolds. The climactic moment of "Corrupted Battle" features symphonic rock uncommon to game music, adding unique style and vision to the broad musical spectrum of MapleStory. This innovative track dovetails classical and modern tones to create the perfect musical representation of the dark conflict roiling within Damien’s mind. Become a hero once again with the stunning Heroes of Maple soundtrack!


TRACK LIST
01. Through the Blizzard 2:05
02. Showtime 2:02
03. Pain and Sorrow 2:07
04. Army of Fears 2:03
05. Heroes of Maple 2:07
06. Heroes of Maple (Piano Arr.) 2:12
07. Anthem for Heroes 2:10
08. Timeless Beholder 2:09
09. Time is Gold 2:06
10. Endless Journey 2:16
11. The Devil is Coming 2:08
12. Jazz for Dr. Lim 2:08
13. Climbing Up the World Tree 2:04
14. The Tragic Fate of Damien 1:29
15. Corrupted Blood 1:38
16. Pain to Hope 2:13
17. Travelers 2:23

Music by StudioEIM, ASTERIA
Published by NECORD, NEXON


MP3 files will be downloaded to your MapleStory Steam Directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\MapleStory\

data.short_description: A MapleStory Original Soundtrack Album for music featured in Heroes of Maple.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7 or later
  • Processor:Intel Core Duo 2.4Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.4Ghz
  • Memory:2GB RAM
  • Graphics:GeForce 8600 GH / ATI Radeon HD 3450
  • Hard Drive:At least 14GB of free space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • We recommend that you install DirectX version 9.0 or higher for the client to run smoothly
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 7 or later
  • Processor:Intel Core Duo 3.0Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 3.0Ghz
  • Memory:at least 4GB RAM
  • Graphics:GeForce 9600 / ATI Radeon HD 3870 or higher
  • Hard Drive:At least 14GB of free space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • We recommend that you install DirectX version 9.0 or higher for the client to run smoothly
